reviewText: i actually heard this concert on youtube as individual songs but they were taken down about a week ago[12/15/17].i came to amazon to see about purchasing this dvd because they are that great live.marina hebiishi is absolutely one of the most amazing singers i've ever heard and is pitch perfect live and just plain perfect.and very cute as well.but now the bad news.there is only one of these dvd's available at a measly $283 bucks! this tells me it's out of print and needs to be reissued for sale at a reasonable price,then i'm in.in the meantime maybe somebody will load it back on youtube
